qas.question: Who was the principal of Sangzao Middle School?
What was the principal credited with?

answers.text: proactive action that spared the lives of all 2,323 pupils in attendance when the earthquake happened

qas.question: How many students attended the school?
How much money was used to strengthen the construction of the school?
What school principal strengthened his school?
Where is the Sangzao Middle School?
The Sangzao school is one of the biggest in what county?
How many years was Ye Zhiping involved in the school overhaul?

context: <a0_0><a4_0>Ye Zhiping<a4_0/><a0_0/>, the principal of <a5_0>Sangzao<a5_0/> Middle School in Sangzao, one of the largest in <a6_0>An County<a6_0/>, has been credited with <a1_0>proactive action that spared the lives of all <a2_0>2,323<a2_0/> pupils in attendance when the earthquake happened<a1_0/>. During a <a7_0>three-year period<a7_0/> that ended in 2007, he oversaw a major overhaul of his school. During that time he obtained more than <a3_0>400,000 yuan<a3_0/> (US$60,000) from the county education department, money used to widen and strengthen concrete pillars and the balcony railing of all four storeys of his school, as well as secure its concrete floors.
